thread.title: Supreme Court to decide free speech for anti-abortion centers

title: Supreme Court to decide free speech for anti-abortion centers
text:
Supreme Court to decide free speech for anti-abortion centers 3:22am IST - 01:13 
The Pregnancy Care Clinic in the Southern California city of El Cajon is before the U.S. Supreme Court to challenge a California law that forces centers that are licensed as family planning facilities to post notices that the state has programs offering free or low-cost birth control and abortion services. Freddie Joyner reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
